name: The Door Game (TJ)
description:
The Door Game is a text-based, micro rogue-a-like where you go through doors competitively.  It aims to answer the age old question - can anything that can be done be done better than anyone else?

It is developed by Tom Jubert, the narrative designer behind games including Subnautica, FTL, The Talos Principle, The Swapper, Driver: San Fransisco and more.

It is based on the writing of Alan Watts.

After you. No really, I insist.

If you enjoy the game please consider supporting me: https://www.patreon.com/tomjubert
